# binderhub-r

A repository for launching [R](https://www.r-project.org/) on [binderhub](https://github.com/jupyterhub/binderhub) instances.

To know more, please, visit [The Data Society](https://github.com/thedatasociety).

[![launch @ gke.mybinder.org][badge-jupyterlab-gke-mybinder-org]](https://gke.mybinder.org/v2/gh/nicolas0liveira/binderhub-r.git/master?urlpath=lab)
